oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wightman Chapel of the Belle H. Bennett Memorial, Scarritt College for Christian Workers, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Wightman Chapel of the Belle H. Bennett Memorial, on the campus of Scarritt College for Christian Workers in Nashville, Tennessee. The Wightman Chapel, designed by architect Henry C. Hibbs in the Gothic Revial style, was built with Crab Orchard stone and completed in 1928. The Wightman Chapel was named in honor of Maria Davies Wightman, the wife of Bishop William May Wightman. Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.
